name: barrier+ Triple Lipid + Niacinamide Activating Serum
about: What it is: A high-potency serum with 10 potent, active ingredients such as niacinamide and peptides clinically shown to visibly plump, firm, and reduce fine lines...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Dryness..Formulation: Serum..Highlighted Ingredients:.- 9% Patent-Pending B-L3 with Barrier Lipids and Peptides: Helps increase natural lipids to improve skin barrier health..- 3% Polyglutamic Acid Complex: Four times more effective in retaining skin hydration than hyaluronic acid..- 2% Brightening Niacinamide : A potent antioxidant to visibly brighten, smooth, and support skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This cushiony, lightweight serum is formulated with a breakthrough, patent-pending B-L3 technology and seven other potent, barrier-restorative active ingredients. This formula increases ceramides to support the lipid barrier and boosts elastin, and hyaluronic acid to deliver visibly firmer, plumper skin...Clinical Results: In a clinical study on 30-33 subjects over 28 days:.- Visibly plumps, firms, and reduces fine lines..In a consumer perception study on 30-33 subjects over 7 days:.- 90% saw smoother, healthier-looking skin and a visible improvement in skin texture in 1 week..In a clinical study on 33 subjects as part of a 2-step regimen:.- 7x the plumping effect when using barrier+ Triple Lipid Activating Serum and barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Cream together..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency....Allure
ingredients: -9% Patent-Pending B-L3 with Barrier Lipids and Peptides: Helps increase natural lipids to improve skin barrier health..-3% Polyglutamic Acid Complex: Four times more effective in retaining skin hydration than hyaluronic acid. .-2% Brightening Niacinamide : A potent antioxidant to visibly brighten, smooth, and support skin. ...Water/Aqua/Eau, Caprylyl Caprylate/Caprate, Propanediol, Jojoba Oil/Macadamia Seed Oil Esters, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Squalene, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Amylopectin, Lecithin, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Collagen Amino Acids, Lithothamnion Calcareum Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Oligopeptide-3, Oligopeptide-2, Oligopeptide-1, Hexapeptide-11, Folic Acid, Bacillus/Soybean Ferment Extract, Lactic Acid, Phospholipids, Ceramide NP, Phytosterols, Phytosphingosine, Ceramide AP, Cholesterol, Myrica Cerifera (Bayberry) Fruit Extract, Akebia Quinata Stem Extract, Prunus Lannesiana (Cherry Blossom) Flower Extract, Saccharomyces Lysate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Tripeptide-1, Ceramide EOP, Polyglutamic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Acetyl Glutamine, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Carbomer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Dextran, Phenoxyethanol........The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-A potent barrier-restorative treatment to support and prepare skin for retinol, vitamin C, exfoliating acids, makeup, sunscreen, and environmental stressors. Ideal for pre- and post-procedure including micro-needling, laser resurfacing, and peels. .-Apply this before any other product to maximize efficacy and prime skin for your other products. Apply morning and night..-Apply one to two pumps to a clean, dry face..-For best results, pair with barrier+ Triple Lipid-Peptide Cream (sold separately) morning and night after the serum...Recycling Instructions:.-This bottle, cap, and base are made from 50 percent post-customer recycled plastic. .-Unscrew the pump and dispose of it in its proper container. .-Rinse the bottle to clear out contents and place it and the cap in the recycle bin..-All Skinfix's boxes are made from Forest Stewardship Counsel-certified, 100 percent recycled paper using vegetable-based inks..-Place in recycle bins.

reviews.review_text: I've been using the Skinfix Barrier+ Triple Lipid + Niacinamide Activating Serum for a few weeks now, and the results are incredible. My skin has always been prone to dryness and redness, especially during the winter months, but this serum has been a game-changer. The texture is lightweight yet hydrating, and it absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky residue. What I love most is how it has visibly improved the firmness and plumpness of my skin. My fine lines are noticeably less visible, and the overall tone of my skin looks more even. I've even noticed that the persistent dry patches on my cheeks have completely disappeared! This serum has become a staple in my skincare routine, and I can't imagine going without it. Highly recommend for anyone looking to hydrate, firm, and rejuvenate their skin!

reviews.review_text: Excellent formulation and a great mix of potent and effective ingredients that don't adversely affect one another. I am a chemical engineer and have worked in beauty for my entire career (11 years), so when I say I've tried almost everything, I've tried almost EVERYTHING. This is a great hydrator and the actives it's paired with makes it next level.  To anyone saying u201cdon't buy this, it didn't work for me and I've been using it for two weeksu201d etc, NO product is going to visibly and physically change wrinkles, acne scarring, deep lines, etc in two weeks. Try it for two MONTHS and your review might be valid.

reviews.review_text: This serum is very very impressive. Do not sleep on this one. The ingredients list has some of the best ingredients for anti-aging and collagen boosting skincare.  Niacinamide, lactic acid, Collagen Amino Acids, and a long list of peptides & ceramides just to name a few. I've been using this serum with the peptide cream for two weeks and I'm now seeing excellent results. This treatment was specially formulated to repair and prepare skin for retinol, Vitamin C, and exfoliating acids. I use this treatment with all of these ingredients and it takes my skin to the next level. My skin looks the best it has ever looked at 48. I am going to purchase this treatment for life to go with my retinol and Vitamin C treatments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best purchase in the last decade. I'm honestly not sure my skin ever had a good barrier, nor did I understand what it could be like to have one. I've been using this and this alone with my tretinoin .05% 2-3 times a week recently and I'm SHOCKED to report that my skin did in fact develop an actual barrier. I've used this maybe 9 times over 4ish weeks and my skin has a glowy, protective, oiliness to it that it's just never had. No dry crusty skin. No flakiness on my nose. No constant blackheads.  Paradoxically, because I would have thought oily would mean more breakouts, my acne is almost gone and it previously needed constant benzoyl peroxide and clindamycin daily for 3 years to deal with an ever-present outbreak of forehead acne. I feel like I can take a breath for the first time in so long. A whole life problem is now off my shoulders, however small it may seem. It turns out my skin was bothering me more than I thought. I forgot what it was like not to live with such damaged skin. Anyway, if you're on the fence, I say give it a good go and stick with it for a few months. I hope it works for you as well as it did for me!

Because of a medication I must take at the moment, my skin has aged rapidly and gotten horrible acne (they're two of the million side effects of the medication), but thanks to these two I have finally seen a breakthrough after trying so many serums from Sephora, like Youth to the People, etc. Nothing I've tried before had worked so fast. As a side note, I also use Retin-A, the highest concentration which is 0.1%, but only once a week together with this serum. The rest of the days I use the Summer Fridays retinol and this serum. As a person who was always told I looked 10 years younger and now I look my age (thanks to the medicineI must take), this serum has been is a blessing because it has diminished my wrinkles tremendously, and helped heal my acne.

reviews.review_title: The perfect do it all serum!

reviews.review_text: I have been completely obsessed with this from the first use! My skin looks so plump and glowy plus just such a beautiful radiance. I'm reaching for this more than my normal serums because of how hydrated and smoother this makes my face. Couldn't recommend enough and the texture is the perfect consistency to absorb evenly with no sticky residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to use this for a while to be able to give my honest opinion. And it actually came in time because my dry skin was literally craving some deep moisture relief. This is so good and perfect especially for dry patches and when your skin needs some moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The winter season means that my skin has been desperate for some additional hydration against the cold. This serum has been a great addition to my routine. It's not a miracle worker but definitely has some great ingredients. However, it is quite a pricey product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try this product and it definitely did not disappoint at all. I love to apply this right after I get out of the shower because my skin seems to get really dry after a shower and absorb skincare really well. This made my face feel healthy. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum will BANISH dry, dull winter skin! One pump after cleansing and toning (applied to damp skin) keeps your face plumped and hydrated, no fine lines and no scaly skin.  After a week of daily use, I'm impressed by how well my face is retaining moisture and the bounciness of my skin.  Its light enough to layer, so I can definitely see bringing this into the warmer months as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This the perfect collagen boosting serum to apply after washing your face and before moisturizing. My skin felt more hydrated after applying! It targets loss of elastin and loss of collagen. Perfect for all skin types, even sensitive. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix is such an amazing brand for my sensitive skin. I have used their products throughout the years and never have I been disappointed. This serum is lovely, has a thin consistency that absorbs quickly but leaving the skin hydrated and soft. I use this am and pm with their face cream and my skin has retained its moisture during this dead of winter! Love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is fabulous! I'm new to SkinFx and have been using this product for several weeks now. I live in a dry climate and this product has been so amazing ! It truly has helped my skin feel hydrated & soft, which in turn makes my skin look & feel younger & healthier. I have very dry cheeks and I just love how soothing this serum is to my cheeks in particular! The texture is very light & silky and blends into my skin without sitting on top. Works beautifully with my other skincare items, doesn't pill! No scent detected, thankfully! Highly recommend, especially for those dealing w any dryness/dullness!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum!  It pairs nicely with my other skincare products and has a light texture,  It helps not only the feel of my skin but the appearance.  Leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth.  I recommend applying this before your makeup for a subtle glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I started this serum in a moment where my skin was so irritated after a big break out. In literally one day of use my skin was feeling healthier. I like its creamy texture and how hydrating feels on the skin. I love the combination of actives. I highly recommend this product if you want to restore your barrier fast. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In my past experience, skinfix has been a reliable brand so I was very excited to try out the serum. I'd recommend using it in conjunction with the other products from the same brand/line for the best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great hydrating and nourishing serum. It's lighter weight than I expected and sinks into the skin nicely. For that reason it's great day or night. This is the perfect barrier repair serum. Also love the packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this serum for a week and my skin is looking plumper & I  have noticed a lot more glow. My skin feels more even and softer, it has definitely improved my texture and hydration.  The gel like texture of the serum is really nice, I am a fan of lightweight and this is perfect for my combination skin!  It works great with my moisturizer without making it too heavy on my skin.  I am excited to continue using it and see even more improvements.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is smoother, plumper and healthier after using this serum. I use this after essence and before other serums to prep for the acids. Plays well with other skincare and makeup. Doesn't leave a tacky/sticky feeling either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing product. I love Skinfix for my eczema prone skin. It doesn't make my face irritated, dry or sensitive.  The ceramides, lipids and all the ingredients make a beautiful concoction to protect your skin's healthy barrier and to keep the skin moisturized for long. I love how soft and supple my skin looks and feels after using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this serum free from Skinfix for a review. This serum has a great mix of ingredients. Niacinamide to brighten and collagen to plump the skin. It blends in nicely to my normal to dry skin. Excited to continue using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the composition of this product and how this blends well on the skin. I use this serum on my AM  & PM routine. This goes pretty well under my makeup.It became a staple on my routines and I really love how this feels so nice and blends well when layering with my other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: (gifted in exchange for honest review) I tend to pay more for my serums than any other step so while the price doesn't look inviting, I'm here for it when it works! My skin feels plump, hydrated & just feels healthy when using this. No issues with my other products, plays well & no pilling! So far I've noticed my skin looking bright & even with less redness for sure. As with anything I need to use this longer to speak to the long term benefits, but first impressions are solid!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrated and well nourished skin! It's winter time and my skin is typically very dry around this time of year - even more so than usual. During this season, I look for products that are hydrating, but won't hurt my sensitive skin. This product fulfilled all my wishes! The packaging is simple and user friendly. No weird scents. The texture is easy to apply and soaks into my skin. Absolutely love & would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!! This product is amazing, it's super hydrating and leaves the skin looking extremely glowy and bouncy. I hate creams/serums that leave my face sticky and this one just leaves my skim feeling soft and hydrated! Been using this with during an acne flare up and it's not irritating or bothersome to my skin! Also perfect product to put on for no makeup days when you still wanna look glowy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am pretty biased when it comes to this brand. Every product that I have used has done wonders for my dry/mature skin. The texture was thicker than most serums but performed like a moisturizer. I loved the way it melted into my skin and provided instant hydration. I could visibly see plumper and bouncier-looking skin. The hydration was incredible and long-lasting. My skin felt nourished and felt protected throughout the day. I could reapply it with no problem, and it blended in well with my other skincare and makeup products. I highly recommend this. I have been applying this every day and my skin has been looking and feeling great!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like how this serum feels on my skin and how it makes my skin feel smoother and bouncier. I can seey skin looking healthier and brighter. It works well with my acne prone skin too. I like how lightweight it feels and it goes on seamlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formulation for this is so dreamy. It has an emulsion/lotion-like consistency and sinks into the skin really well. I noticed even after one use my skin literally felt softer, smoother and looked more balanced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is thick! It almost feels like a moisturizer. It's a lovely texture that absorbs nicely and makes my skin look healthy. I was hoping my husband's sensitive skin would tolerate this serum, but it irritated his skin. I wouldn't recommend for sensitive skin but would recommend otherwise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix is a clean skincare brand and this is what I like the most about it. Its vegan , cruelty free  and  ,fragrance free . The product is smooth and gets absorbed into the skin well without leaving any greasy residue. The consistency is more of cream than  serum.  After having used it for a week I feel my skin is more smooth ,plump and moisturized.  It does not feel dry and patchy as it does during drier months.  My skin absolutely loves this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Whats not to love about this serum, firstly the ingredients are wonderful and best of all it works great for my skin. My skin feels so hydrated and nourished after every application. I have stored to notice that my skin looks even after using Thai for some time. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and this is an incredible brand! Overall a fantastic product and leaves my skin feeling amazing and the ingredients are clean I look refreshed and it feels great on my skin. Overall love it and definitely feels amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! Even after a few uses, my skin was looking and feeling healthier. I used it after toner but before everything else and I felt as if it laid down a good base before the rest of my skincare routine. It has a really easy texture to work with and sits very nicely on my faceu2014especially under my makeup. My skin hasn't been the best this winter but I feel like this product helped get it back to a healthier place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum truly does give noticeable results in an hour! My skin instantly feels more hydrated and radiant and after using for about a week my skin is much more hydrated, plump , and my fine lines are diminishing. I love the texture of the serum, it absorbs so nicely into my skin. This serum pairs perfectly with other products in both my daytime and nighttime skincare routine and doesn't pill when I use makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! I just got microneedling done on my face and so obviously my face was very red and irritated. I used this serum and it helped calm my skin down without clogging my pores. I recommend this!

reviews.review_title: Plumper skin in just a week!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is saving my dry, flaky, winter skin! I apply this right after cleansing and before moisturizer, and right away I notice a difference in hydration. My skin looks brighter and feels less dry immediately upon application. I've been using this for a week and I am noticing plumper and firmer skin. I am really happy with how my skin looks and feels!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so awesome! I love the texture, the smell is subtle, and I really like the way the product is packaged.  I have come to know this about all of my skinfix products actually. But this one has really great ingredients as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this serum out after I accidentally damaged my skin barrier and I must say it did help repair it. It is very hydrating and instantly gave me a nice and healthy glow! I really like the texture and that there is no added fragrance! This product also layered well with other products in my routine and did not pull like others! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight, soothing serum when applied and I really like the formulation of ceramides, collagen, nicinamide, etc. which are all great for skin barrier + smooth skin. Easy to pair with any of my other skincare products and really enjoying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Skinfix Triple lipid + Collagen serum is such a great addition to my routine. I always need something to help with my barrier and this has been very helpful in that. The serum is white and a little thicker than your normal serum. It helps my skin by keeping it moisturized and plump. The price might be a bit scary for some as it's $69 for 30 ml.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Skinfix serum is great, it has made my face look and feel smooth.  I love the texture of it and how easy it is to apply.   So far so good and a great new part of my morning time skincare routine

reviews.review_title: The newest staple in my regimen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving how my skin looks hydrated and plump. I was suffering from the winter time dryness. But this has rescued my skin and made it more supple and not flaky. A little goes a long way and the formula just sinks in and preps my skin for the next steps. 10/10 recommend this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum makes my skin look and feel healthier: it is brighten, firm & smooth. I've start seeing results after one week of using it.   I love the texture of the serum.   Usually I use it morning and night.   I've notice that it pairs nicely with my make up products.   Overall, this product is really really good.   I'm so happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is light, absorbs quickly and is nice for my sensitive skin. The moisturizer works well for me since it doesn't have a scent and this is the same way. After cleansing I spray my skin with the Caudalie grape water and pat this into my skin on top. I don't love that the cap on the product is so big, but that is my only complaint

reviews.review_title: Leaves skin plump and healthy looking
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum leaves my skin plumper, more hydrated and smooth! I love the lightweight texture and how easily it is absorbed into my skin. It pairs well with my other skincare products and is easily layered.  My skin looks glowing and healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry combination skin so I'm always looking for serums to go under my cream for additional hydration. My skin looks and feels moisturized and healthier when I use this! I like the texture as it absorbed easily into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love SkinFix, so I already knew that this product would be amazing. I love the packaging and the serum is super lightweight but it does go on tingly. I do have to put extra moisturizer on after using, but have noticed my skin is radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very effective, leaving my skin feeling hydrated and healthy the morning after applying. It's minimized my pores and makes my skin appear smoother and more even. The ingredients are also clean and great for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this skincare product. I feel like my skin texture has improved so much.  My skin feels plumper and brighter and softer. I love how healthy my skin feels! I will be using this everyday from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely hydrating serum! It has a gel-serum texture and feels very cooling when applied to the skin. It layers really well with other products. I haven't noticed any pilling. It's also very soothing and hydrating. It immediately makes my skin look plumper and healthier!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So basically this is like a miracle serum! It is super lightweight and easy to layer with other products! It helps boost skin's natural ceramides, collagen, elastin & hyaluronic Acid! It has 2% Niacinamide (which I love) that helps brighten, firm & smooth skin! Lastly it has 3% Polyglutamic Acid Complex (I've never heard of but holy cow) it's 4X more effective in retaining hydration than hyaluronic acid! Again, it's a miracle product!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice activating serum I have combination skin let me tell you skinfix is the best I love how nice my skin looks and feels I'm using it daily twice a day the texture is really nice. And softer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive, dehydrated and acne primer skin so I'm always v nervous about trying new products but I am so glad I started using this skinfix serum!! It's so hydrating and leaves me with a beautiful glow that lasts all day! It's sooo gentle, my skin absolutely loves this product. I use it every morning & night as my last step (before sunscreen ofc) and also as a primer before makeup!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! I seriously love everything that skinfix creates. My skin has been so dry and red because of the cold weather. This makes my skin feel soo hydrated, soft, and smooth. The texture is great because it melts instantly into my skin and makes it feel great. The packaging is super cute too! You need this if you're looking for a hydrating and plumping serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has quickly become a new favorite! It had an amazing light texture and absorbed really well, no residue feeling at all. After the first time using my skin immediately felt so hydrated. It can get really dry so this worked perfect for me. After using it for a little while I've noticed my skin looking brighter and firm - just overall more healthy looking!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: must have product for plump, glowy looking smooth and soft skin! I also love the super silky texture of this serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use rich cream in the end of my skincare routine so I prefer my serum being lightweight and absorptive. This product manages to provide extra hydration I needed without being heavy. I can easily add it to both of my morning and nighttime routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is perfect for the winter. My oily skin is drier than normal and this serum has been hydrating my skin and treating and preventing flakey skin. It's not too greasy or thick. The texture is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: what I loved is seeing such a difference I saw a glow, a shine and stunning texture in my skin. I decided to change out my serum to skin fix and I'm pretty happy with my results . Love the ingredients and the packaging was cute it was my first time using skin fix brand. Plus I do have a dry/ sensitive skin so had no reaction I love the serum and happy to got a good experience with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is super hydrating! Keeps my skin hydrated, plump and glowing. I love using it in the morning and at night and it's great for makeup prep! Melts into the skin and leaves skin perfectly glowing and ready for makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum saved my skin during cold winter on the east coast. I live in CA so when I go east to visit my family my skin SUFFERS. However, the serum kept me dewy and glowing despite dry cold air. I also noticed that my acne really subsided meaning that it's helping repair my skin barrier! A WIN all around!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this serum!! After I wash my face it helps bring back the glow. The texture of this serum is legit so smooth and perfect and makes my face feel refreshed after my skincare routine. It also has already helped reduce a pretty bad hormonal breakout I've been having. This is the first collagen serum product I've tried but I'm a huge fan already and highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix never disappoints! I've been loving what this serum is doing for my skin, it's a thicker serum with a cream/gel texture but soaks instantly into the skin, not heavy at all and layers beautifully with my other products! This is become my one of my favorites because of how calm, soothed, and hydrated my skin feels after using this! You can tell just on my hand with a before and after how soothed and hydrated it looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a free gift in exchange for an honest review. I really enjoyed my initial impressions of this serum! First of the ingredients are wonderful, it's pact full of ceramides and peptides which is a huge win for me! It's also fragrance free which I love! The texture is light, moisturizing and extremely silky! I think this would be perfect layered under the Skinfix gel cream if you wanted to add ceramides into your routine wile still maintaining light weight hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum was just ok. It didn't really provide the silky feel I'm used to with my usual serums. I think I would use this more in the hotter months but right now my skin is on the drier side and I need a bit more nourishment. All in all it paired very well with the moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hello Hydration! This serum has been such a nice addition into my winter skincare routine. I use it mostly at night, but it's great anytime. Now that the weather is cooler, this has been so nice to give my skin a little TLC.  This formula plays nice with pretty much every moisturizer I've tried it with, but it really shines with Skinfix's barrier cream. The two paired is an absolute dream so if you have that, you have to try it with this serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It feels so good to apply, like a moisturizer. It absorbs great. It is so hydrating and makes my skin feel and look healthier. It layers well. I have nothing bad to say. I'm loving it so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using retinol on my face for years now and it messed up my skin barrier. My skin would be dry and have redness on my cheeks. This product was exactly what I needed to fix my skin barrier!! I use it in conjuction  with my retinol and vitamin c serums and I reaaally love the finished product. Its so smooth and I can already feel my skin heal. Cant wait to use it farther down the road!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin gets so dry in the winter months that it practically cracks when I smile. This ultra-gentle, non-irritating serum instantly hydrates and feels like a tall glass of water for my parched skin. I layer it over my essence and under my thick moisturizer. It moisturizes, layers, beautifully, and plumps up my skin with a healthy dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All skinfix products work so well for my sensitive skin and this is no exception! I find this serum really helps keep my skin hydrated during the dry weather in the winter and layers well with my moisturizer without pilling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this from Skinfix in exchange for a review. I really like incorporating this into my routine during the colder month. Feel like it makes my skin feel much more hydrated and plumper with continued use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This year and has everything that I want it's got a collagen's lipids it's plumping. It's nourishing it's hydrating my dry winter skin is absolutely loving this I highly recommend this to anybody with skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice product for reducing dryness and making my skin feel healthier . I like making this a part of my night routine and applying in addition to my eye cream and moisturizer.    Thank you Skinfix for the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Skinfix products and couldn't wait to add this serum to my collection. I really like the lightweight, creamy texture, it absorbs quickly into my skin. It's the perfect serum for the Winter time, it keeps my skin super hydrated all day long. Plus I've noticed my skin looks firmer,  plumper, and has a beautiful, healthy glow. So far I'm loving the results I'm getting and it agrees with my combo skin so well. This serum is definitely a keeper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was gifted the product barrier + lipid + collagen + niacinamide activated cream by Skinfix in exchange for an honest review. I surprisingly liked this product. Glad I received it in the winter time because my face gets drier and need something a bit more moisturizing. On top of that my face looked less dull so that was a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix has quickly become my favorite brand. Every product they come out with is incredible and makes my skin feel so good and this is no exception. I love using it with actives to soothe my skin and calm my barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying out a Skinfix product and I am obsessed! This serum has easily become a staple in my skincare routine. My skin looks so hydrated and plump after using. It's a very lightweight product that layers perfectly. Must have for glowy, moisturized winter skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this line of products from Skinfix. I own a few of their products and it was for sure that i needed to at this to my collection. I really like this collagen serum. Its rich but absorbs quick which makes it really good before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has a light and very pleasant texture, I like that it is easily absorbed leaving a beautiful and soft glow, the skin feels soft and hydrated.  Something I like is that it helps increase collagen, it is vegan and cruelty free.  It has been great on my skin and my favorite part is how soft it feels on the skin.  I am excited to continue using it and see what else it can do for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great hydrating and barrier supporting serum. It sinks into the skin super nicely and my skin feels glowy and plump after using it. This has been perfect for the winter time and really makes my skin feel hydrated and nourished.

reviews.review_title: Love the glow it gives me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a HUGE fan of this Skinfix serum! I've been using it daily and my skin looks so plump and hydrated.  I love that it layers nicely with the rest of my routine as well. Overall, it makes my skin look super healthy and firm. Definitely a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skinfix is a brand I've tried for the first time this year - I love how hydrating their products are and this serum is a perfect addition to my routine! After use my skin feels plump and glowy. I love the texture of the serum, it's thicker and a little tacky on the skin and I wake up with healthier, hydrated skin. Since it's thicker I do like to use this at night rather than the morning, but with the tackiness I can see it working well under makeup. At night it layers well with my other products and I feel like my skin looks smoother. A wonderful serum I'm so happy to have tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is super hydrating & absolutely perfect for my skins barrier. My skin is extra dry this time of year & the serum came in perfect timing. It has a silky, almost like lightweight moisturizer texture to it and it blends in and absorbs into the skin so well. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
